description: abstract image; central biomorphic and geometric form in blue, grey, white and yellow; football shaped element at center with basket-weave design; red and blue grid and guidelines throughout; small sketches in red and blue of three-dimensional forms in ULC and LLC
medium: Graphite, charcoal, chalk, and oil pastel on paper
provenance: Private collection, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2011.
signed: none seen (verso not examined due to framing)
title: Untitled
